source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Learn 3DS Max: Low Poly Sword

visible_instructors.name: Jonathan
visible_instructors.job_title: Marketing Artist | Concept Artist | Graphic Designer
visible_instructors.title: Jonathan Lam

items.headline: Start learning 3D Studio Max by creating a Low Poly Sword in this quick and easy course.
objectives_summary: You will be able to create a Low Poly Model
You will be able to create a Low Poly Sword
You will be able to use 3D Studio Max at a basic level

items.title: Kinetic Typography in PowerPoint - Animate in Powerpoint

visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.job_title: Engaged and Passionate PowerPoint & After Effects instructor
visible_instructors.title: Andrew Pach

items.headline: Use Powerpoint for kinetic typography animation. Effective powerpoint 2013 skills
objectives_summary: The rare ability to make kinetic typography videos in PowerPoint
Basic knowledge about typography and choice of fonts
An animation-ready template file to use for your projects

items.title: Become a Professional Character Animator
items.headline: Animation training from a former Disney Animator - helping YOU reach your Dream Job as a character animator!
objectives_summary: Get your DREAM JOB at an animation studio!
Understand the difference between 'good' animation and GREAT animation!
Produce high quality character animation consistently and easily.

items.title: Cinema 4D Masterclass: Project Based Cinema 4D Course
items.headline: Learn Cinema 4D from scratch as you create 4 beautiful 3D scenes. Learning Cinema 4D has never been easier.
objectives_summary: Model 3D objects using different modeling techniques in Cinema 4D.
Create textures for your 3D models using Body Paint.
Model and sculpt complex 3D objects easily.

items.title: Creating a Scene in Blender 3D.
items.headline: Learn how to create a simple scene in Blender using pre-built models from the internet and Blender effects.
objectives_summary: Source Public Domain or Creative Commons 3D models.
Know when it is okay to use such models within your own work.
Create basic models of the moon, clouds and use Quick Effects to turn an object into Quick Smoke, then modify to show flames and smoke.

items.title: After Effects Logo Animation - after effects motion graphics

visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.job_title: Engaged and Passionate PowerPoint & After Effects instructor
visible_instructors.title: Andrew Pach

items.headline: Create motion graphics logo animations in After Effects. A complete guide to title openers in after effects
objectives_summary: Create engaging logo intro animations
Be better with After Effects
Make better youtube videos

items.title: Autodesk Inventor 2020 Complete Beginners Course
items.headline: Learn to use this great software for mechanical design and 3D printing
objectives_summary: A thorough understanding of Autodesk Inventor for complete beginners
A Thorough foundation in Inventor Basic Modelling Skills
Outputting Designs for 3D Printing

items.title: Learn Cinema 4D: Low Poly Wolf

visible_instructors.name: Jonathan
visible_instructors.job_title: Marketing Artist | Concept Artist | Graphic Designer
visible_instructors.title: Jonathan Lam

items.headline: Start learning Cinema 4D by creating a Low Poly Wolf in this quick and easy course.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to create basic low poly 3D models in Cinema 4D
You will be able to render 3D scenes in Cinema 4D
You will be able to create a low poly wolf character

items.title: Project Grenade-Game ready asset!

visible_instructors.name: Milivoj
visible_instructors.job_title: Award winning Senior Artist and a professor at Art Academy
visible_instructors.title: Milivoj Popovic

items.headline: Learn Zbrush Hard Surface modeling, Substance Painter, Marmoset Toolbag and so much more!
objectives_summary: Zbrush-Substance-Marmoset! Students will learn polymodeling/hard surface sculpting and retopology in Zbrush, diving deep into Zmodeler!
They will learn basics of Substance Painter, how to import a sculpt in Substance Painter and transfer high poly details to low poly model!
We will explore Substance and see it's magic in creating amazing materials super quickly!

items.title: After Effects: Create Slide Shows - Build a Complete Project

visible_instructors.name: Louay
visible_instructors.job_title: Motion Graphics / Visual Effects / Video Editing
visible_instructors.title: Louay Zambarakji

items.headline: Adobe After Effects Tutorial - Build a Complete Slide Show and Package your Project for Re-Sale or for Personal Use
objectives_summary: Create a full Slide Show Project
Understand the structure of a Slide Show Project
Use Photoshop files to Import Images

items.title: Mastercam l CNC Programming

visible_instructors.name: Swaylen
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn engineering Course anytime and anywhere
visible_instructors.display_name: Swaylen CAD I CAM I CAE  Expert
visible_instructors.title: Swaylen CAD I CAM I CAE  Expert

items.headline: Mastercam 2018, from beginner-advanced techniques Mailing, lathe, and Multi-axis operation with CNC Programming
objectives_summary: Wire-frame Geometry Creation, Surface And Solid Modeling, Dimension, Importing and Exporting of Non-MasterCAM  files (such as AutoCAD, SolidWorks etc.)
Lathe ,Milling and Multi Axis  Programming Solution
Toolpath Generation & Verification Programming

items.title: Orc Cyborg Character Creation in Zbrush
items.headline: By the end of this course, you'll be able to model nice muscular Orcs with Armors, Guns, artificial Cyborg Arm.
objectives_summary: Sculpting the orc muscular body
Making the robotic arm
Making clothes, belts and armor

items.title: Complete Hardsurface Modelling & Sculpting inside ZBrush4 R8

visible_instructors.name: UK Online
visible_instructors.job_title: Online training centre based in the UK creative studies
visible_instructors.title: UK Online Training Centre

items.headline: Learn pretty much everything to create hard surface models all inside ZBrush, this course is fast pace so be prepared!
objectives_summary: After this course you will have a ton of skills to tackle pretty much any hard surface project all within ZBrush!

items.title: Interior 3D Rendering 3ds Max + Corona : The Quickest Way

visible_instructors.name: Jake
visible_instructors.display_name: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor
visible_instructors.title: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor

items.headline: Become a 3D expert in modelling, lighting and rendering with 3ds Max and Corona render engine in under 2.5 hours
objectives_summary: Create a photo realistic image from scratch
Master the workflow pros use day to day to make 3D renders
Discover how the pros do it so you can create your own Photorealistic 3D Renders with 3ds Max and Corona

items.title: Complete Character Creation in Maya for Beginners
items.headline: Be able to Model, Texture, Rig, Animate, Simulate Cloth and Hair and Render characters using Maya and Substance Painter.
objectives_summary: Cartoon Character Modeling in Maya
Texturing in Substance Painter
Basic Character Rigging

items.title: Character Design MADE EASY with Moho & Anime Studio

visible_instructors.name: Jeremy
visible_instructors.job_title: Teaching Game & Software Dev, Web Design, & Email Marketing
visible_instructors.title: Jeremy Alexander

items.headline: Easily creating characters in Moho & Anime Studio
objectives_summary: Easily start to learn Anime Studio Pro drawing techniques!
Know the ins and outs of Anime Studio Pro's drawing tools!
Learn how to bring your own drawings into the software to later be animated and brought to life!
